description: Take a dip in between meetups. A new way to social during Consensus HK 2026. Open 7am-10pm during the week. Towel and swimwear provided. Walk-in welcome, but pre-book on comeasap.com/booking to avoid disappointment. Paid entry only. DM us on IG @comeasaphk for questions. 11 Stanley Street, Central Mon-Fri 7am-10pm Sat-Sun 9am-10pm
